ome.smuggler.core.service.mail

Interface MailClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MailClientAdapter

    public interface MailClient
    Defines the functionality our services need to send mail. An external service provider supplies the actual implementation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void send(PlainTextMail data)
      Relays a mail message to a server.
      void stream(PlainTextMail data, java.io.OutputStream destination)
      Writes a mail message to the given stream.

    • Method Detail

      • send

        void send(PlainTextMail data)
        Relays a mail message to a server.
        Parameters:
        data - the message to send.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the argument is null.
        MailClientException - if a sending error occurs.

      • stream

        void stream(PlainTextMail data,
            java.io.OutputStream destination)
        Writes a mail message to the given stream.
        Parameters:
        data - the message to send.
        destination - where to output the message.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any argument is null.
        MailClientException - if an I/O or MIME message error occurs.
